metadata.synopsis: Three-way dialog with both dapper drow twins in the taproom. The player can hire either of them or both, if they have a partner with them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Sharess' Caress, 29; 43; 74Talk to the any of two drow there.

45.speaker: Nym Orlith
45.text: Couldn't get us off your mind, could you?

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Mamzell Amira said you could offer your services as a gift of her thanks.

59.speaker: Sorn Orlith
59.text: Of course you came back! I never doubted you would.

65.speaker: Nym Orlith
65.text: My, my, I can tell you are a special one from a single glance.

20.speaker: Nym Orlith
20.text: You have but to ask, and we can grant you a moment of pleasure.

49.speaker: Halsin
49.text: An intriguing pair. Takes me back to my youth...

187.speaker: Player
187.text: How did you end up here?

236.speaker: Sorn Orlith
236.text: I used to work as a courtesan back home, and my sister as an artisanal masseuse, but men are treated like dogs by the Underdark's matriarchs, so we fled.

261.speaker: Nym Orlith
261.text: We found surfacers crave the body of a Drow like a drug. Life is easy in our line of work.

305.speaker: Player
305.text: I was once in your position, in a way.

150.speaker: Player
150.text: I try not to think about it any longer.

220.speaker: Player
220.text: Just what I had to do to get by.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: I was forced into it, but it sounds as if you weren't.

75.speaker: Sorn Orlith
75.text: I'm very sorry to hear that... There are many courtesans who end up in the business out of unfortunate necessity. We, however, could easily take up other work if we wished.

119.speaker: Nym Orlith
119.text: After years working here, though, Mamzell is like family, and makes sure our clients treat us with as much respect as we want to be treated with.

183.speaker: Sorn Orlith
183.text: Pleasure is what I know, and what I do best. Here, I work to create it anew for myself each eve.

266.speaker: Player
266.text: If you're truly pleased with the work here, I can't judge you.

241.speaker: Player
241.text: I'm glad you've found a place you feel safe.

124.speaker: Sorn Orlith
124.text: I'd have to restrain myself far more than any play-bindings do if I worked in another field. This is a place where I can be myself boundlessly.

272.speaker: Sorn Orlith
272.text: There are so many who come to me speaking of a fixation that no one else has ever been able to share with them... and never will again.

113.speaker: Sorn Orlith
113.text: A once-in-a-lifetime moment of passion. Every day. What could be better? Don't you want to try it?

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Maybe I would like to share it with you, then.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Mamzell Amira said you could provide me with a gift for helping her.

247.speaker: Nym Orlith
247.text: Silly, we are the gift. One free ride with me or my brother.

296.speaker: Sorn Orlith
296.text: Or perhaps you have greater ambitions yet.

98.speaker: Sorn Orlith
98.text: Trust me, you don't want to miss my signature Menzoberranzan Love Trick.

46.speaker: Narrator
46.text: *Menzoberranzan love magic - a formidable practice, usually only reserved for pleasing the most insatiable matriarchs in the city of spiders.*

147.speaker: Nym Orlith
147.text: And is that your partner with you? What a gorgeous couple... perhaps we could come to an agreement.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: You make a tempting offer, but for your safety, I've got to say no.

267.speaker: Player
267.text: I've already got a partner, and that's plenty for me, thanks.

293.speaker: Player
293.text: Menzoberranzan Love Trick? But you are Seldarine drow, why are you fooling your customers?

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Menzoberranzan Love Trick? But you are Seldarine drow, why are you fooling your customers?

164.speaker: Sorn Orlith
164.text: Darling, we are not fooling anyone. Unless you pay for me to make a fool of you.

80.speaker: Sorn Orlith
80.text: You'll just have to see what is in store.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: You don't actually lie with one another... do you?

212.speaker: Sorn Orlith
212.text: We can make up a little show of kissing each other, but when we are hired at the same time, there are often many other clients in the room to attend to.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Eugh. Well, I am certainly not hiring both of you at once.

209.speaker: Nym Orlith
209.text: Ha! We are quite accustomed to working with each other, if you change your mind.

276.speaker: Player
276.text: Aren't you at risk of inbreeding, if you keep working together?

14.speaker: Sorn Orlith
14.text: Since I came to the surface, I purchased an enchantment to bless me with infertility, if that soothes your mind.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: I suppose I haven't ticked incest off the moral atrocities to-do list yet.

203.speaker: Nym Orlith
203.text: Our bodies will haunt your dreams.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'd like to hire your services, my lady.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I want to hire you, beautiful lad.

299.speaker: Nym Orlith
299.text: We want both of you, silly! At the same time.

134.speaker: Halsin
134.text: So long as all are willing, I see no reason why we should deny ourselves...

160.speaker: Astarion
160.text: I'd like to try doing things like this again, now I'm free to find my own desires.

129.speaker: Astarion
129.text: And don't worry, I'll dart out if I don't enjoy it faster than I used to run from the sun.

219.speaker: Halsin
219.text: Perhaps you'd care for a little extra company...

225.speaker: Astarion
225.text: Consider yourself invited! Combined, we've had five hundred years to hone our talents - let's put them to bad use.

242.speaker: Shadowheart
242.text: I won't pretend the thought hasn't crossed my mind once or twice... or more than that.

74.speaker: Gale
74.text: Well I suppose it would do no good to back out now. Let us begin this little anthropological study, if we must.

222.speaker: Halsin
222.text: Oh, I suspect we shall be more than merry...

172.speaker: Sorn Orlith
172.text: There must be a sprinkling shower of gold, first. Ahem. Coin. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_3_01f129ea-b4dc-44b6-8154-9a948f876a82])

223.speaker: Player
223.text: Mamzell Amira said you could offer your services as a gift of her thanks.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Damn Helsik's portal, orgies are where the money goes!

195.speaker: Player
195.text: Sorry, Halsin, I was hoping this would just be between us three.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Sorry, Halsin, I was hoping this would just be between us three.

178.speaker: Halsin
178.text: As you wish. I'm sure I can find berth elsewhere...

136.speaker: Player
136.text: I will return when I can afford to debase my party's coin.

263.speaker: Nym Orlith
263.text: For being a friend who helped Amira, we will charge a little less. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I can barely afford new underclothes at the moment, yet alone this.

286.speaker: Halsin
286.text: As you wish. I'm sure I can find berth elsewhere...

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Sorry dear, I want to hire them both for myself.

89.speaker: Astarion
89.text: What? Really? What could they possibly offer you that I can't do better?

277.speaker: Shadowheart
277.text: Fine, hog them all to yourself. Perhaps I'll find amusement elsewhere.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: This is getting to be too much. I'll pass, after all.

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: There's an idea. If you're comfortable sharing... so am I.

248.speaker: Karlach
248.text: A brother. And a sister. At the same time. Yeah - no. You do your thing, but that's not mine.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: You won't be upset if I choose to partake?

232.speaker: Karlach
232.text: Upset? I guess not, as long as everyone's, you know - above board. I get the appeal in theory, but the reality makes me want to take a lye bath.

90.speaker: Sorn Orlith
90.text: We will only allow that if we know there is an evening of exceptional pleasure awaiting us. Usually one darling alone is not enough to match the two of us.

301.speaker: Player
301.text: I would like to spend time with you, lady Nym.

181.speaker: Player
181.text: Well, Sorn, you sound like a charming man. Let's go up together.

289.speaker: Astarion
289.text: You have a type, don't you? Elven prostitutes? Again? It's rather embarrassing, dear.
289.context: NodeContext: whispers 'prostitues' pretending it's a scandalous notion

61.speaker: Astarion
61.text: Enjoy yourself, of course, but I dearly hope you aren't only having sex because we haven't in a while.

73.speaker: Nym Orlith
73.text: If your beloved one wants to join, we could work out something to our mutual satisfaction.

93.speaker: Sorn Orlith
93.text: Two of us, two of you. Four gorgeous people.

206.speaker: Player
206.text: That's a bit much for me.

146.speaker: Nym Orlith
146.text: Whatever you wish! But with another pair is the only way we will both be happy to join you.

294.speaker: Player
294.text: Though I estimate I could take seven to twelve drow on my own, I'm happy to start with one.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Can't fault you for being clear about limits. It can be just the two of us.

66.speaker: Nym Orlith
66.text: You're welcome if you have the coin. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

130.speaker: Player
130.text: Mamzell Amira said you could offer your services as a gift of her thanks.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I'll come back when I can afford to squander our hard-earned gold.

298.speaker: Player
298.text: Maybe this isn't the best idea. I'll say goodbye.

249.speaker: Nym Orlith
249.text: I'll be a little treat for you, then.

199.speaker: Nym Orlith
199.text: This way. We have a room upstairs over yonder side.

281.speaker: Player
281.text: On second thought, this is a bad idea.

265.speaker: Sorn Orlith
265.text: Exquisite! You know the price, right? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

282.speaker: Player
282.text: Mamzell Amira said you could offer your services as a gift of her thanks.

192.speaker: Player
192.text: I'm broke - I'll come back when I can copulate away the party's savings.

211.speaker: Player
211.text: Perhaps I shouldn't do this, never mind.

69.speaker: Sorn Orlith
69.text: Ah, a person of taste indeed.

110.speaker: Sorn Orlith
110.text: Come hither. We have a room upstairs.

213.speaker: Shadowheart
213.text: Should I be jealous? At least you have good taste.

168.speaker: Lae'zel
168.text: Bah. You would break our bond for the sake of laying this - this is'lak?

186.speaker: Wyll
186.text: I thought we were weaving our own tale, you and me. Don't turn your back on it.

170.speaker: Gale
170.text: I'd prefer you didn't do this. If I'm not enough for you, I could always conjure us some kind of non-sentient companion.

235.speaker: Karlach
235.text: Have fun, soldier. Leave something left for me later, ey?

228.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
228.text: If this goes ahead, her luck will run out rather quickly.

208.speaker: Halsin
208.text: You know my feelings - nature's impulses must be pursued. Do as you will, with my blessing.

302.speaker: Halsin
302.text: Your gold, and your loins. Not for me to dictate what you do with either.

121.speaker: Nym Orlith
121.text: Return to us if you have a lover willing to take part.

48.speaker: Karlach
48.context: NodeContext: Calling the player a degenerate

273.speaker: Gale
273.text: This is all a bit much for me. Back home in Waterdeep, I prefer to have Tara leave the room before I undress.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: If Gale's not comfortable, I'm not interested.

257.speaker: Player
257.text: You're quite sure? I promise, it would be a tressym-free tryst...

268.speaker: Gale
268.text: You're adorable even when you're teasing me. But I must decline.

122.speaker: Gale
122.text: I'd rather tangle with a dragon than get tangled in all those limbs.

198.speaker: Player
198.text: If you're nervous, don't be. I'll be right by your side. Or perhaps on top...

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: I appreciate that - but I can't help how I feel.

163.speaker: Nym Orlith
163.text: A shame, but either one of us will be ready for you, if you wish to have us.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: This from the man who wanted us to make love as gods? You must be at least curious...

118.speaker: Gale
118.text: I might enjoy watching you tangled up with the drow, as long as I was five paces back.

83.speaker: Astarion
83.text: Ahem. Sorry, pet, I'm not quite comfortable with doing this again yet.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Don't worry, I wouldn't ask such a thing of you.

108.speaker: Astarion
108.text: Eugh, don't be so nice to me! It makes me want to be nice back.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I would have liked to, but I understand.

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: While it's a fascinating prospect, I'd like you all to myself... at least the first time.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: I'm glad. Provided we survive, there's plenty of nights yet to come.
15.context: NodeContext: Cheeky extra emphasis on 'to come'

290.speaker: Lae'zel
290.text: I do not share what is mine. And I will not be shared.

295.speaker: Player
295.text: I couldn't have said it any better.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Forget I said anything. Let's drop this.

253.speaker: Wyll
253.text: No, no. I want romance, not - not debauchery.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You had to spoil the fun, didn't you?

166.speaker: Wyll
166.text: I value affection over fun, a lasting memory over a passing fancy. This is our story, not theirs.

221.speaker: Player
221.text: It was a bad idea. I'm sorry.

300.speaker: Wyll
300.text: It's all right, I promise. But I hope when the sun sets and the stars rise, your dreams always lead to me.

81.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
81.text: I don't like to share. Lay a finger on them, and I'll cut you.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: And I don't want to share you.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: You can cut them if you want, dear.

297.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
297.text: I was talking about cutting you.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: I would like to hire both of you. And I hope my partner will join us as well.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: I want both of you. At the same time.

11.speaker: Nym Orlith
11.text: In that case, we will require two of you. And indeed, I suggest it because I have never seen a creature as fair as this pale beau beside you.

23.speaker: Astarion
23.text: What a world. I never dreamed I'd be on the paying end in a brothel.

285.speaker: Astarion
285.text: But, our leader here has made the dire mistake of failing to sleep with me so far, and it's a mistake I have been aching to correct.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Not if it's with him. Not interested.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: My apologies, Astarion, we should correct that mistake!

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I might regret this, but why not.

196.speaker: Player
196.text: Why are you interested in my partner?

227.speaker: Nym Orlith
227.text: Well, there are two of us, aren't there? Use your imagination.

30.speaker: Nym Orlith
30.text: Perhaps once we have saved more gold another adventure will begin. We've had busier days, but life is comfortable here with Mamzell.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: As long as you are here of your own free will.

38.speaker: Nym Orlith
38.text: Life is prosperous. I am much happier kissing the many lips of the surface than tending a field or manning a shop.

145.speaker: Player
145.text: Are you sure this is where you want to be?

133.speaker: Sorn Orlith
133.text: It was not my work itself that has ever been a challenge to me, merely the circumstances.

8.speaker: Sorn Orlith
8.text: I worked in this business in the Underdark, but it grew to festering monotony.

229.speaker: Sorn Orlith
229.text: The entirety of drow culture is obsessed with bondage beyond reason. While such activities have their charms, I yearned to reach greater depths.

165.speaker: Sorn Orlith
165.text: And there is no society on this planet more laterally, imaginatively, and confusingly depraved as that of Baldur's Gate. Although of late, I do feel I've seen everything. Perhaps you'll show me something new?

84.speaker: Player
84.text: No wonder, look at us. We're immaculate.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: What kind of services do you provide?

204.speaker: Sorn Orlith
204.text: What do you think, silly? Love of course! Hot and vulgar with me, or sweet and sincere with my sister.

94.speaker: Halsin
94.text: More than interested, if you feel the same.

180.speaker: Sorn Orlith
180.text: There must be some devious thoughts in your mind we can help you explore.

70.speaker: Sorn Orlith
70.text: A new face! Looking for another chapter of dirty lore for your biography?

71.speaker: Nym Orlith
71.text: You are back with your partner. It would be a delight to spend time with both of you.

86.speaker: Sorn Orlith
86.text: Go forth! Many nights with your partner await you! Our work is done, and we must attend to other clients.

34.speaker: Nym Orlith
34.text: But I hope you keep coming back to Mamzell's for the drinks!

102.speaker: Sorn Orlith
102.text: You're back! Why don't we try again? Throw our bodies back into the ring!

125.speaker: Sorn Orlith
125.text: You have had my sister, now let my cock bring you the deliverance of the astral plane!

169.speaker: Nym Orlith
169.text: Ah, I was hoping to see you again.

158.speaker: Sorn Orlith
158.text: My Mezzoberranzan love is always cocked aready.

191.speaker: Sorn Orlith
191.text: Sorry, friend. But you look like you can't take what I mete out. Bring someone with a rear of cast-iron.

27.speaker: Nym Orlith
27.text: Don't waste a moment, bring your partner. I want to see what you can do.

197.speaker: Nym Orlith
197.text: You have returned... I hope you are all right after leaving. We are always happy to try again.

239.speaker: Sorn Orlith
239.text: I know that look in your eye. Since being with me, you feel as if you are a Northdark Cavern: a hole that can only be filled by Drow.

246.speaker: Nym Orlith
246.text: Without the fungal infestations, I hope.

304.speaker: Nym Orlith
304.text: You survived my brother? Let me know if you want to have a more calming time with me.
